document_data.name: Rornagar Breakblade
document_data.mainbody: '''Rornagar Breakblade''' was a member of the [[Bloodshields Band]] adventuring party in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: As an adventurer with the [[Bloodshields Band]], he mostly kept watch at the rearguard.
document_data.Relationships: Rornagar Breakblade was a member of the Bloodshields Band; his leader was [[Gaerond]].
document_data.History:
While looking for [[Elminster Aumar]] in [[Shadowdale]] during the early spring of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the leader of the Bloodshields Band, Gaerond, called on Rornagar's talent at spotting to determine where their guide, [[Thal]], had disappeared to after showing them the way to Elminster's cave.

The whole band was slain by [[doppelganger]]s, led by a fake Elminster, after they conversed with him briefly.
